Product Title: Mama's Family Seasons 1-6 (DVD)
Review Date: 2020/08/16
Store: Various  (Actor, Director)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Comedy
Product Description: ["Mama's Family Seasons 1-6 (DVD)", "A spun-off sketch from the Carol Burnett Show, Mama's Family mined humor from a squabbling family in the Midwestern blue collar suburb of Raytown. The noisy clan was headed by Mama, a buxom, gray-haired widow with sharp opinions and a sharper tongue who shared her small house with her high-strung sister Fran, a local journalist.", ']]>']
Average Rating: 4.8
